name: Fruity catch!
description:
Fruity catch! is a casual game played with the right and left arrow keys. The goal is to collect fruit in a specific order, showed above. In order to collect fruit, it needs to fall in the basket controlled by the left and right arrow keys. If the right fruit is collected a checkmark will appear on the collected fruit icon, and the next fruit will need to be collected.

Controls:

Left-Right Arrow keys

Update 1.1 [31-3-21]: Added new fruit and animation to the select icon

Update 1.2 [31-3-21] (HUGE): Remade the spawning system, reworked controls, added better UI.
